Name: Jewel
Ingredients: 15 ml Green Chartreuse (or alternative herbal liqueur)
5 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of skewered Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: The original recipe, and indeed our old recipe, called for equal parts of the three main ingredients to create a powerful cocktail in both alcohol and flavour. Upping the gin but knocking back the Chartreuse rebalances this classic cocktail.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Stanley M. Jones' 1977 Jones' Complete Barguide .
Nutrition: One serving of Jewel contains 150 calories
